source_objects.title: Arts & Crafts
source_objects.description: From quilting to cake decorating, crafting inspiration to art instruction, welcome to the ultimate place for courses in arts & crafts.

items.title: Abstract Techniques Revealed Vol. 1  Create Large Modern Art

visible_instructors.name: Gino
visible_instructors.title: Gino Savarino
visible_instructors.job_title: Professional abstract artist, gallery owner and instructor

items.headline: A loose and carefree approach to creating abstract contemporary paintings.
objectives_summary: Paint a large, textured and colorful modern art piece.
Have the confidence you are looking for to create a contemporary painting without spending a fortune on tools and materials.

items.title: How to make sugar craft faces
items.headline: A guide to creating perfect faces for cake decorators and sculptors
objectives_summary: Create sugar craft faces
develop your skills and confidence

items.title: Create Bath and Body Products From Natural Ingredients

visible_instructors.name: Shona
visible_instructors.title: Shona O'Connor
visible_instructors.job_title: Crafter, Maker of Soap, Hair, Bath and Body, Trainer

items.headline: Make your own natural bath and body products at home. A step by step guide to creating your own products and recipes
objectives_summary: Easily create all the bath and body products demonstrated in the course so that they can have a luxury spa experience in their own home for an inexpensive cost
Mix and match ingredients so that they can alter the recipes to create their own unique products.
Use colours, ingredients and fragrances to make fabulous looking, amazing smelling bath and body products and also to create themed ranges of products

items.title: The Art & Science of Drawing / SHADING: BEYOND THE BASICS
items.headline: Learn to take your shading skills from basic to advanced.
objectives_summary: How to observe, analyze and draw light and shadow on any subject.
How to draw and shade concave forms like cups and bowls.
How to apply the basic shading process to complex subjects.

items.title: Draw Islamic Geometric Patterns With A Compass And Ruler
items.headline: Learn to Construct, Outline, Tile And Interlace Five Different Patterns.
objectives_summary: Construct four different islamic geometric patterns
Outline the pattern having constructed an underlying grid
Tile eightfold and sixfold patterns.

items.title: Learn to Paint With Impact
items.headline: From ordinary to stunning paintings! What makes a painting stand out from the rest? Learn how to add impact to your art.
objectives_summary: This course will show you how to assess a subject like an artist. Compose and paint a subject with confidence for maximum impact.
You will know how to mix colors to the correct value.
Why edges are so important.

items.title: The Art of Lockpicking: A Complete Guide

visible_instructors.name: David
visible_instructors.title: David La
visible_instructors.job_title: Professional Locksmith, Locksmith Trainer at The Locksmith Academy.

items.headline: The secrets of lockpicking revealed in a comprehensive course made by 2 professional lockpickers.
objectives_summary: Understand how pin-tumbler locks work
Pick almost any lock in seconds
Create your own set of bump keys

items.title: Drawing Fundamentals 1: Basic Skills & Sketching Accurately
items.headline: Sketching & Drawing Basics For the Absolute Beginners. Learn to See and Draw Anything Accurately!
objectives_summary: How to set up your workspace for optimal drawing success.
How to hold and control your pencil to create smooth, clean lines.
The most common mistakes beginning artists make and how to avoid them.

items.title: How to Draw Dynamic Comic Book Superheroes - Start to Finish
items.headline: A Complete Step by Step Guide to Drawing Comic Book Heroes
objectives_summary: By the end of this course you will know how to create a variety of comic book superhero concepts from your imagination.
You will know how to create dynamic poses for your character designs.
You will have a much better understanding of how to draw comic book characters with perspective.

items.title: Paint Landscapes in Watercolor Part 1
items.headline: Learn how to paint realistic landscapes in a loose and free style
objectives_summary: Paint landscapes in a loose and easy style

items.title: Beginning Drawing and Painting Course for Beginners
items.headline: Students Will Learn How to Draw & Watercolor Paint 12 Cute Animals Step-By-Step. For Beginners of All Ages and Abilities
objectives_summary: Create 12 Magnificent Watercolor Animal Paintings.
Participate in an activity that cultivates critical thinking skills, develops hand-eye coordination, and encourages self-expression.
Apply the knowledge gained in this course to create unique masterpieces.

items.title: Oil Painting Master Series
items.headline: A complete course for artists wishing to get started with oil painting or further their skills and knowledge.
objectives_summary: How to choose the right materials, their properties, and how to use them in oil painting
How to prepare a support – boards, stretching, and preparing canvas
How to layout your palette and mix complex colors

items.title: Clip Studio Paint Pro/Ex (Manga Studio 5)
items.headline: Clip Studio Paint Pro/Ex (Manga Studio 5): Digital graphic arts, drawing, painting, 2D cell animation and comic books
objectives_summary: To use Clip Studio Paint essentials to produce complex art from simple techniques
Drawing fundamentals focusing on digital drawing using both tablet and mouse
Digital illustration workflow

items.title: Paint Realistic Watercolour and Botanicals - CHASING AUTUMN

visible_instructors.name: Heidi
visible_instructors.title: Heidi Willis
visible_instructors.job_title: Renowned Watercolor Artist and Art Tutor

items.headline: Exploring the incredible colours and textures of Autumn in the watercolour medium and botanical illustration genre
objectives_summary: Practice putting what we've learned from 'Paint Realistic Watercolor and Botanicals - STUDIO BASICS' into action
Understand the development of a simple idea or painting from start to completion
Identify suitable colour choices for a simple subject or element

items.title: A Pro's Guide to Digital Comic Book Coloring
items.headline: Learn the entire process start to finish in Photoshop. Coloring is so much more than just staying inside the lines.
objectives_summary: Learn everything from the very basics of layering to finishing pages with special effects.
Understand color theory as it applies to comic art.
Master the art of storytelling as you learn about plane separation, strategic rendering, and the importance of value and contrast in your pages.

items.title: Fluid Art Mastery: Abstract Flow Art Secrets Revealed
items.headline: 9 Steps To Being A Successful Paint Pouring Artist
objectives_summary: further develop advanced skills and knowledge of paint pouring
Improvisational skills to help create their own Paint Pouring masterpiece
